comment: /**  * Return the specified Java Bean property name in dashed form.  * @param name the source name  * @return the dashed from  */
code: /**  * Return the specified Java Bean property name in dashed form.  * @param name the source name  * @return the dashed from  */ public static String toDashedForm(String name) {     return toDashedForm(name, 0). }

comment: /**  * Return the specified Java Bean property name in dashed form.  * @param name the source name  * @param start the starting char  * @return the dashed from  */
code: /**  * Return the specified Java Bean property name in dashed form.  * @param name the source name  * @param start the starting char  * @return the dashed from  */ public static String toDashedForm(String name, int start) {     StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder().     String replaced = name.replace('_', '-').     for (int i = start. i < replaced.length(). i++) {         char ch = replaced.charAt(i).         if (Character.isUpperCase(ch) && result.length() > 0 && result.charAt(result.length() - 1) != '-') {             result.append('-').         }         result.append(Character.toLowerCase(ch)).     }     return result.toString(). }
